item.title: Application Developer (san rafael)
item.description:
Company:
Proctor Engineering Group specializes in energy efficiency products and services related to the Heating, Ventilation, & Air Conditioning (HVAC) industry. Through these services, we are working to help reduce the effects of global warming. For general information about the company please visit our website at www.proctoreng.com

Job Description:
We are looking for an Application Developer to redesign our diagnostic software and associated database(s) originally developed by Proctor Engineering in Visual Basic 4. The right candidate must be proficient in:
· VB.net
· .net Framework
· SQL Server (2000 & 2005)
· Microsoft Access
· Transact SQL (stored procedures, views, etc.)
· Technical documentation.
item.dc:title: Application Developer (san rafael)
